title: envato font?
content:
hi, anyone recognize the italic font used in the envato logo? thanks so much!!!! :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041832im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-envato_3588.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Logo-envato.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041832/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-envato.jpg) | 13.54 KB |
author: adenson

comments.content: looks like [Agenda Medium Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425041832/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/agenda/) with a modified t.
yes i'd agree. thanks so much!!! :)
